questions.Question: What is the capital city of India?
questions.CorrectAnswerExplanation: New Delhi became the capital of India in 1911, replacing Calcutta (now Kolkata).

questions.Question: Which of the following are among the world's top two largest rainforests? (Select 2)
questions.CorrectAnswerExplanation: The Amazon (South America) is the largest, and the Congo Basin (Africa) is the second largest rainforest in the world.

questions.Question: Which planet is known as the 'Red Planet'?
questions.CorrectAnswerExplanation: Mars appears red due to iron oxide (rust) on its surface.

questions.Question: Which of the following are primary colors? (Select 3)
questions.CorrectAnswerExplanation: In traditional color theory (RYB), Red, Yellow, and Blue are the primary colors.

questions.Question: Which is the largest ocean on Earth?
questions.CorrectAnswerExplanation: The Pacific Ocean is the largest and deepest of Earth's oceanic divisions.
